Sentencas: The ceramic-glass was employed as the most commonly used seal materials in planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, a novel glass with relative low glass soft temperature was added into Al2O3 powders to form ceramic-glass composite seals by tape casting technique.
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Based on the tested result of gas tightness and compressibility, it was found that the seals with 40 wt% glass exhibited excellent seal performance at the leakage rates of only 0.01 sccm.cm(-1) under gas pressure of 10.2 kPa, and compressive load of 0.17 MPa at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The seals showed the desired thermal cycle stability at low leakage rates within 10 thermal cycles.
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It can be observed that the deformability of seals sharply increase when the glass contents was higher than 30 wt%.
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Microstructural analysis of the seals also exhibited very good interfaces bondage and chemical compatibility which was in good agreement with gas tightness prediction for the flexible ceramic-glass seals model.
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The seals have been applied in large size cell test to confirm its applicability in SOFC.
Titulo: Development of flexible ceramic-glass seals for intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell
